When you've just landed in Barcelona from a 10 hour flight, checked into your hotel and have now been up a full 24 hours, something reminiscent from home comes to mind....a great tasting burger.Bacoa is that place...even my mom was impressed and she's not a burger person.Must order: patatas rusticas Was looking forward to trying the lamb burger...either I missed it on the menu or it isn't available at this location....guess there has to be a next time!
